title: Coronavirus: Chinese explorers start Everest climb amid pandemic
description: China has limited climbs to its nationals while Nepal has cancelled all expeditions.
content:
Image copyrightGetty ImagesImage caption
 Expeditions from the Nepalese side of Mount Everest have been cancelled altogether
Over two dozen Chinese mountaineers have begun an expedition on Everest as the site remains closed to foreign climbers because of co… [+3284 chars]
